Content:: Annie Perreault (born 28 July 1971 in Windsor, Quebec) is a Canadian short track speed skater, who won medals in the 500 m and 3000 m relay at the 1998 Winter Olympics. She had already won a relay gold medal at the 1992 Winter Olympics.  This article about a Canadian Winter Olympic medallist is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. This biographical article on a speed skater in Canada is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
